scripts.package: npm run build && node --experimental-sea-config sea-config.json && node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync(process.execPath, 'build/Data7ModuleGenerator.exe')" && npx postject build/Data7ModuleGenerator.exe NODE_SEA_BLOB dist/sea-prep.blob  --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2
